name: Afterburn (itch)
description:
A short little game to refresh myself on Unity. Made in a week.

Use your engine flames to hit the enemies to destroy them, use the spin to quickly whip your ship around to destroy the enemies. Good Luck!

Both tracks used are no copyright, but can be found at these links:
Main Menu Theme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ZYYb...
Game Theme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AOq9f...
